about_the_game:
X-MiGu Fighters is the follow up to 2017's Stripper Anya: Demon Slayer! (click read more for full discription and features)

IMPORTANT! If you buy this game and play on a Windows 10 System, READ THIS FIRST:
... if you blow this off the game will not run correctly. :D Thanks!

NEW & OUT NOW from X-MiGuplay: BARE BOOB BRAWLERZ: POWER CLAW



Coming soon from X-MiGuPLAY!



X-MiGu Fighters takes us back to the world of Stripper Anya! 5 years have passed since Anya's clash with Demoniqa.What was once a group of high profile Strippers working for the Triple T is now a group of fierce fighters engaging in the RenMiGu Tournaments. Our top heavy hero Anya competes in the company of her co-dancers Ghost, Lynchu and Esstraya as well as others from new and old alien worlds. They're joined by Magnus, the Guild member that was instrumental in connecting Earth with life from beyond. Take part in each of the 14 character's individual journeys and play through the cohesive story told over 6 seasons of fighting!
X-MiGu Fighters Options Include:
-Tutorial
-Story Mode
-1 Player vs CPU Free Play Mode
-2 Player vs Mode
-3 Difficulty Settings
-Max Rounds Options: 3, 5, or 7
-Graphics Settings Low or High
-Customized Game Pad Controls

X-MiGu Fighters marks X-MiGuPLAY's 2nd PC title which honors the late 90's/2000's arcade fighting game craze. This is a retro inspired 1 on 1 fighting game meant to be played lightheartedly with a comedic approach. Your friends will judge you but we won't! ;) #guiltypleasures

*figures based on online data accessible to X-MiGuPLAY as of 09.25.2019

content_descriptors.notes:
This game has nudity! It plays like a retro fighter from the 1990s. 
异想天开的游戏。像旧格斗游戏一样玩。有裸体的人。
기발한 게임. 오래된 전투 게임처럼 플레이하십시오. 알몸의 사람들이 있습니다
気まぐれなゲーム。昔の格闘ゲームのように遊べます。裸の人がいます。
おかしいとユニークなゲーム。古い格闘ゲームのようです。 1080グラフィック人は裸です。

name: Stripper Anya™ 2 X-MiGuFighters

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 or higher
  • Processor: i3 or higher
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: INTEL HD Integrated Graphics
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Regarding the INTEL HD Integrated Graphics Requirement, the newer and higher end processor you have, the better. We've recently updated the game to have a lower resolution setting. When the low graphics setting is enabled, the system requirements drop drastically but some system my still have issues getting to 60 FPS. Lower specification systems may slow down the game speed. If this is your scenario, we encourage you close all other applications and ensure your system is not running any unnecessary processes in the background. A lot of elbow grease was put into this in the hopes that more people can enjoy this game on a variety of PCs.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows 7 or higher
  • Processor: i3 or higher
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA 750 equivalent or higher
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: NVIDIA laptop users, right click game icon and select run with Graphics card for best results.

reviews:
“Verdict X-MiguFighters isn’t the best 2D fighter I’ve played, but it’s definitely not the worst either. Apart from the obvious boobie appeal, the combat is surprisingly tight and the controls more responsive than I expected. The rather brash script helps to increase the humorous appeal of the game, too. If it had more variation in moves across the different characters I’d be more inclined to play it more often, but it’s worth the low price of admission even if only to experience what it has to offer once.”
In-Depth Review –

“Instead of being a brawler, X-MiGuFighters: Stripper Anya 2 is a classic 1-on-1 fighting game. The players can choose from 14 characters including the titular Anya and her three stripper friends: Ghost, Lynchu, and Esstraya.”
Rated Lewd? –
short_description: Tired of everyone getting offended about everything?!? 🙌 So are we! How about some Topless street fighting?! 😍 Your friends will judge you but we won't! #guiltypleasures This is a retro inspired 1 on 1 fighting game meant to be played lightheartedly with a comedic approach.
